dataset.title: PsocodeaSF: Psocodea Species File in the Catalogue of Life

individualName.surName: Johnson K.P., Smith V.S. & Eades D.C.

abstract.para: The Psocodea Species File is a taxonomic database that includes data for Psocoptera and Phthiraptera. Data includes synonymies and citations for all recognized species. Parasitic lice are embedded within bark lice, and thus the single order Psocodea is recognized for both groups. The database currently contains data from "Psocoptera (Insecta): World Catalogue and Bibliography" by Lienhard and Smithers 2002. Updates for Psocoptera are in the process of being added. Data from major Phthiraptera catalogs will be added at a later date, together with host associations. When completed this database will house data from over 10,000 valid species and associated data.

address.deliveryPoint: Harborne Building, The University of Reading

gbif.citation: Species 2000 & ITIS Catalogue of Life: 23rd March 2016, PsocodeaSF

sourceDatabase.authorsAndEditors: Johnson K.P., Smith V.S. & Eades D.C.
